segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, creating a real mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in the middle of it, drying a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm afraid he's going to fall and hurt himself if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both being really sneaky, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on the dishes that she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take her to notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm and tidy compared to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone helps her clean up the water before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
